DisplayedItem.name: DI_381608
DisplayedItem.title: This case summary is recommended for reporting biopsy specimens, but is not required for accreditation purposes

DisplayedItem.name: DI_330668
DisplayedItem.title: Specimen ID may be entered with the selected location

DisplayedItem.name: DI_330925
DisplayedItem.title: This applies in cases where there are 2 or more sites (containers) that contain cancer with different Gleason Scores.

Question.name: Q_378739
Question.title: ?Systematic Biopsy Overall Grade (required only if there are 2 or more sites [containers] that contain cancer with different Gleason Scores)

Question.name: Q_381545
Question.title: Percentage of Pattern 4 (applicable for Overall Systematic Biopsy Gleason Score 8 and above)

Question.name: Q_378751
Question.title: Percentage of Pattern 5 (applicable for Overall Systematic Biopsy Gleason Score 8 and above)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_330927
DisplayedItem.title: # The Global Gleason score takes into account the different Gleason patterns in all positive cores regardless of the topographic distribution. The Composite grade takes into account the contiguous topographic location of positive sites, morphology of the tumor, and the extent of positive sites.

Question.name: Q_330928
Question.title: ?Targeted Biopsy Grade (may be repeated according to the number of targeted biopsy sites)

Question.name: Q_381547
Question.title: Percentage of Pattern 4 (applicable for Targeted Biopsy Gleason Score 8 and above)

Question.name: Q_330943
Question.title: Percentage of Pattern 5 (applicable for Targeted Biopsy Gleason Score 8 and above)

Question.name: Q_381569
Question.title: Combined Systematic and Targeted Biopsy Grade

Question.name: Q_381595
Question.title: Percentage of Pattern 4 (applicable for Combined Systematic and Targeted Biopsy Gleason Score 8 and above)

Question.name: Q_381581
Question.title: Percentage of Pattern 5 (applicable for Combined Systematic and Targeted Biopsy Gleason Score 8 and above)

Question.name: Q_330719
Question.title: ?Cribriform Glands (applicable to Gleason Score 7 or 8 cancer only)

ListItem.title: Treatment effect present and de novo cancer present

ListItem.title: Consider multiple foci as continuous tumor

ListItem.name: LI_366712
ListItem.title: Consider multiple foci as discontinuous tumor
